definition: (of a bird or animal) having a usually ornamental tuft or process on the head
details:
adjective
- (of a bird or animal) having a usually ornamental tuft or process on the head
= synonyms: crested
- having or adorned with tufts
= example: having or adorned with tufts
- (of plants) growing in small dense clumps or tufts
= synonyms: caespitose, cespitose
